about_the_game:
Noiseless is a first-person survival horror game. You follow the story of a freelance investigative journalist who tries to uncover the secrets of the Gaudium Hospital.


Story

As you venture deeper into the ominous depths of Gaudium Hospital, each step echoes through its desolate corridors, you uncover the chilling truth shrouded within its decaying walls. The once bustling halls now harbor unspeakable horrors and as you delve further into the unknown, the terrifying secrets of the hospital begin to unravel before your own eyes.


Features

  • The Walls Have Ears: Every step, every breath, echoes in the darkness and you are not the only one who hears this.

  • Graphics: While not AAA-quality, the game delivers a deeply unsettling and atmospheric world that will haunt players long after they've turned off their screens.

  • Run or Hide: Confronted with imminent danger, you must choose: flee for your life or embrace the shadows and pray to remain unseen.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains instances of violence and occasional scenes of gore, though they are not excessive or harsh.
